en.title: Director of Content Management
en.text: Led the content strategy for technical blogs, tutorials, and documentation on programming and web technologies. Organized tech workshops and training sessions on web development and AI applications. Managed and collaborated with developers, ensuring high-quality content delivery.

en.title: Full-Stack Development & Technical Consulting
en.text: Developed an AI-powered course recommendation system using Django, React, and MongoDB. Built a full-stack e-learning platform integrating recommendation algorithms and user analytics. Designed and deployed responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue.js, and React. Assisted students in debugging frontend & backend issues and optimizing.

en.title: AI Intern
en.text: Developed and trained Machine Learning & Deep Learning models under the supervision of Dr. Usman Ghani. Implemented a CNN model using Tensor Flow and Keras, optimizing accuracy on test datasets. Built a data preprocessing pipeline using Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib for dataset preparation. Worked in a Linux-based environment, ensuring scalability and performance optimization.
